price: Dan demikianlah Kami menurunkan Al-Qur`ān dalam bahasa Arab dan Kami telah menerangkan dengan berulang kali di dalamnya, sebagian dari ancaman agar mereka bertakwa atau (agar) Al-Qur`ān itu menimbulkan pengajaran bagi mereka.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيّٗا وَصَرَّفۡنَا فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ أَوۡ يُحۡدِثُ لَهُمۡ ذِكۡرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan waṣarrafnā fīhi mina al-waʿīdi laʿallahum yattaqūna aw yuḥ'dithu lahum dhik'ran
